Classes in com.complexible.common.io used by com.complexible.common.io
BufferedBOMInputStream.BOM
          Type safe enumeration class that describes the different types of Unicode BOMs.
ByteReader
          Interface for components that can read bytes from a certain source.
ByteWriter
          Interface for components that can write bytes into a certain source.
CloneableByteReader
          Supports the clone operation which may be necessary if multiple clients read from the same source but may have different positions
Directory
          A Directory is responsible for the management of all the IOFiles in a certain location.
FlushableByteWriter
           
Flusher
          Utility class for flushing, optionally asynchronously.
IOFile
          An IOFile represents an element that supports several IO operations, depending on its IOFile.Mode.
IOFile.Mode
           
MultiOutputStream
          An OutputStream that multiplexes writes to all of its child streams.
ObjectWriter
           
Page
          A Page represents a collection of bytes that can be written/read.
Page.Factory
          A factory to create Pages from PagedFiles
PageByteWriter
           
PagedFile
          A PagedFile splits an IOFile into fixed-sized sections called Pages.
PageListener
           
PageManager
          A PageManager is responsible for the management of a set of PagedFiles and their Pages.
SegmentedFile
          Utility class to help with memory mapping very large files in relatively small segments.
SegmentedFileBuilder
           
StringIO
          Utility class to get around the limitation that DataInput.readUTF() and DataOutput.writeUTF(String) cannot handle strings whose encoding exceed 64KB.
